div.label: English
div.div: Flag of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party (BNP)
Any autoconfirmed user can overwrite this file from the same source. Please ensure that overwrites comply with the guideline.

tr.td: DescriptionFlag of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party.svg

td.div: English: Flag of the Bangladesh Nationalist Party - BNP
বাংলা: বাংলাদেশ জাতীয়তাবাদী দল - বিএনপির পতাকা

tr.td: Redrawn from: Bangladesh Nationalist Party - BNP Flag (Archive)

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; border-spacing:8px; background-color:var(--background-color-neutral-subtle,#f7f8ff); border:2px solid #8888aa;color: inherit;

tr.td: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

div.div: This flag was created with Inkscape, or with something else.

table.style: width: 100%; clear: both; margin: 0.5em auto; background-color: var(--background-color-progressive-subtle, #f7f8ff); color: var(--color-base, #202122); border: var(--border-subtle, 2px solid #8888aa); border-spacing: 8px; padding: 0px;

td.i: This image of simple geometry is ineligible for copyright and therefore in the public domain, because it consists entirely of information that is common property and contains no original authorship.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; border-spacing:8px; background-color:var(--background-color-neutral-subtle,#f7f8ff); border:2px solid #8888aa;color: inherit;

tr.td: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; border-spacing:8px; background-color:var(--background-color-neutral-subtle,#f7f8ff); border:2px solid #8888aa;color: inherit;

tr.td:
This work includes material that may be protected as a trademark in some jurisdictions. If you want to use it, you have to ensure that you have the legal right to do so and that you do not infringe any trademark rights. See our general disclaimer.
This tag does not indicate the copyright status of the attached work. A normal copyright tag is still required. See Commons:Licensing.

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 13:00, 6 September 2025

tr.td: Simplified SVG; Colors per the national flag

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 05:16, 2 June 2025

tr.td: modified the central symbols- the gear, the paddy sheats, repositioned and resized the star, resized the red and green stripes, used darker red and green

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:57, 18 April 2023

tr.td: Uploading a non-free logo using File Upload Wizard

div.p: This file contains additional information such as Exif metadata which may have been added by the digital camera, scanner, or software program used to create or digitize it. If the file has been modified from its original state, some details such as the timestamp may not fully reflect those of the original file. The timestamp is only as accurate as the clock in the camera, and it may be completely wrong.
